items.title: Watermelon Tartare
items.descript: Wakame, coconut aminos, avocado, green onion, and sesame. Served with coconut and pecan chips, endive, and crispy kale.

items.title: Bruschetta
items.descript: Flax and vegetable toast, topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, onion, and basil.

items.title: Cashew Brie Cheese
items.descript: Served with strawberry and walnut bread, fig jam, and fresh fruit, drizzled with local honey*.

items.title: Spicy Cucumber Rolls
items.descript: Filled with carrot, avocado, spinach, and a pumpkin seed mousse. Topped with a red chili sauce.

items.title: Dosa
items.descript: Flax and chia crèpe lined with a salted chili paste and filled with plantain, green peas, and coconut. Accompanied with pickled onions, cucumber, mint chutney, and a mango and tamarind sauce.

items.title: Fettuccine Alla Vodka
items.descript: Zucchini and mung bean, edamame noodles in a sundried tomato and cashew vodka-style sauce. Served with garlic bread and crispy mushrooms.

items.title: Green Burger
items.descript: Hemp seed, shiitake, and spinach burger, flax and kale bun, fresh watercress, tomato, pumpkin seed and parsley pate, and cashew cheese. Served with garlic kale chips and a chopped kale salad.

items.title: Heirloom Tomato Marinara
items.descript: Quinoa and brown rice pasta, roasted eggplant, and zucchini. Topped with cashew parmesan.

items.title: Masoor Dal with Roasted Vegetables
items.descript: Seasoned with horseradish, sunflower seed milk, and tomato. Topped with roasted cauliflower, fennel, and carrot.

items.title: Basil Noodles
items.descript: Mung bean noodles, crimini and oyster mushrooms, spinach, kale, and watercress. Served in a basil-infused coconut broth.

items.title: Mexico Bowl
items.descript: Warm brown rice served with a three bean salad, cashew queso, roasted tomato salsa, and toasted pepitas. Topped with fresh corn, tomatoes, red peppers, green onions, and avocado.

items.title: Spicy Pineapple Curry
items.descript: Red peppers, carrots, zucchini, and cauliflower served in a spicy red curry sauce. Seasoned with roasted red peppers, ginger, lime, and coconut milk.

items.title: Chopped Kale Salad
items.descript: inely chopped kale, broccoli, cabbage, carrots, peppers, tomatoes, cucumbers, and spinach. Tossed in a creamy garlic vinaigrette and topped with avocado, walnuts, and sunflower seeds.

items.title: Watermelon and Basil Sorbet
items.descript: Served with local honey* and a pumpkin seed cookie. This dessert is nut free.

items.title: Chocolate Cheese Cake
items.descript: Served with blackberry cream, blackberry purée, and fresh blackberries.

items.title: Lemon Cream Pie
items.descript: Lemon curd and vanilla cream with a rosewater, mango, and grapefruit sorbet.

items.title: Summer Fruit Cobbler
items.descript: Served with vanilla ice cream and and strawberry purée, topped with a pecan and coconut sap crumble.
